tossup_question: -   –  What type of radiation, also known as braking radiation, is emitted whenever a charged particle is deflected by another charged particle?
bonus_question: -   –  A 75 gram piece of copper is heated to 315 degrees Celsius and dropped into a beaker containing 220 milliliters of water that is at an initial temperature of 18 degrees Celsius. Which of the following temperatures, in degrees Celsius, is closest to the point at which the system is at equilibrium?
